Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: Questionable
Description:
A tiny little quest helper plugin, which does quests for you automatically where possible. Uses navmesh to automatically walk to all quest waypoints, and tries to automatically complete all steps along the way (excluding dungeons, single player duties and combat).

Not all quests are supported, check the discord or git repository for an up-to-date list.

Required Plugins: vnavmesh, TextAdvance, Lifestream
Changelog:
v5.20 (2025-06-28)
- Fix gathering as miner checking for the wrong status

v5.19 (2025-06-28)
- Add final Mamool Ja story quest, thanks to Censored
- Add Botanist Level 1-20 quests
- Fix /say message 'Finding Ulaa'
- Fix gathering location for Trackbed Repair Materials

v5.18 (2025-06-19)
- Add missing quests for Tataru's Grand Endeavor, thanks to pot0to
- Add Kobold daily quests, thanks to Censored
- Add `/qst journal` to open the journal window
- Automatically disable certain Pandora's Box features while Questionable is running
- Fix shop purchases for the level 5 gear check quests
- Fix Gold Saucer aethernet shards

v5.17 (2025-06-13)
- Add Mamool Ja 'Sworn' rank-up quest
- Add/Update Kobold, Kojin and Dwarf quests, thanks to Censored
- Add 'Tales from the Calamity' quests, thanks to pot0to
- Add Scholasticate quests, thanks to pot0to
- Fix 'A Private Delivery' quest, thanks to Censored

v5.16 (2025-06-06)
- Add Mamool Ja 'Honored' quests, thanks in part to Theo
- Add Sahagin quests, thanks to Censored

Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: Influx
Description: Uploads your game statistics (such as quest progress, gil, retainer stats) to an InfluxDB or QuestDB instance, making it possible to automatically track your progress through external tools such as Grafana.
Punchline: Sync game stats to InfluxDB or QuestDB
Changelog:
v4.1 (2025-04-05)
- Fix code that only works on the English game version

v4.0 (2025-03-29)
- API 12

v3.0 (2025-03-16)
- Add experimental support for QuestDB

v2.2 (2025-03-02)
- Make plugin compatible with AllaganTools 1.11.1+, thanks to nihilistzsche
- Add 'Test Connection' button in the config window

v2.1 (2025-02-27)
- Add 'Auto enroll characters on login', thanks to Asuna
